title: Carabao Cup third - round draw : Arsenal , Chelsea and Liverpool learn opponents
body_text:
Arsenal are away to Port Vale in the third round of the Carabao Cup while Liverpool will host Southampton and Chelsea travel to Lincoln City.
Elsewhere, Newcastle United will begin the defence of their Carabao Cup trophy against Bradford City.
Tottenham are at home to Doncaster, while Manchester City are away to Huddersfield Town.
Meanwhile, League Two side Grimsby Town, who pulled off a shock upset to knock Manchester United out of the competition on penalties on Wednesday night, are away to Sheffield Wednesday.
Carabao Cup third-round draw in full
Port Vale vs Arsenal
Swansea City vs Nottingham Forest
Lincoln City vs Chelsea
Tottenham vs Doncaster
Brentford vs Aston Villa
Huddersfield Town vs Manchester City
Liverpool vs Southampton
Newcastle United vs Bradford City
Sheffield Wednesday vs Grimsby Town
Wolves vs Everton
Crystal Palace vs Milwall
Burnley vs Cardiff City
Wrexham vs Reading
Wigan Athletic vs Wycombe
Barnsley vs Brighton
Fulham vs Cambridge
This season’s Carabao Cup third-round fixtures will take place across two weeks beginning September 15 and September 22.
Champions League games will also take place in the week beginning September 15, while Europa League fixtures are scheduled for the week beginning September 22 September.
